## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install Advent_of_Code in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure Advent_of_Code package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to Advent_of_Code
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/sky1ove/Advent-of-Code):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/sky1ove/Advent-of-Code.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/sky1ove/Advent-of-Code)

``` sh
$ conda install -c sky1ove Advent_of_Code
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/Advent-of-Code/)

``` sh
$ pip install Advent_of_Code
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/sky1ove/Advent-of-Code)’s
[pages](https://sky1ove.github.io/Advent-of-Code/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/sky1ove/Advent-of-Code) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/Advent-of-Code/) respectively.
